description: Note that this needs the disk.img in the inputs as one continuous
devices so that bootupd can install grub to the mbr. It also needs
all relevant mount points for booting (e.g. `/boot`, `/boot/efi`) in

root-ssh-authorized-keys.description: array of SSH Public Keys to add to roots authorized_keys

target-imgref.description: Specify the image to fetch for subsequent updates

stateroot.description: The stateroot name to use. If not specified, defer to bootc's default

root-mount-spec.description: Source device specification for the root filesystem. If not provided, the UUID of the target filesystem will be used.

boot-mount-spec.description: Mount specification for the /boot filesystem. If `/boot` is detected as a mounted partition, then its UUID will be used.
